experience.title: Front End Engineer

projects.name: Bridge & Swap

projects.name: L2 Mainnet

experience.title: Front End Engineer

experience.title: Back End Engineer
experience.detail: Developed web services for an Intelligent Evacuation System, enabling communication between LoRa devices and detecting high-decibel sounds, such as shooting incidents.

projects.name: IntelEvac
projects.detail: Smart evacuation system for shooting incidents. Introduced in schools across the US, the system was recognized for its innovation and awarded at CES 2020.

projects.detail: Smart evacuation system utilized by government agencies, as well as public and private institutions.

projects.name: LinkMap
projects.detail: An AI-powered platform to enhance your LinkedIn networking. Easily extract and export your connections via a browser extension, and let AI categorize them for efficient management and nurturing.

projects.name: Simple Crypto Wallet
projects.detail: A Next.js web app enables users to connect to their MetaMask wallet, check Ethereum and token balances, and send ethers or tokens to other addresses. Hosted on Vercel.

projects.name: Dev Portfolio
projects.detail: Personal portfolio website supporting localization, with dark/light themes. Hosted on Vercel.

projects.name: Canvas Confetti
projects.detail: Personal art portfolio, created using JavaScript and Sass on Vue.js. AWS S3 & Cloudfront for distribution, and Github Actions for CI/CD.
